question: Q1. What is the advantage of using a three-phase electric system in buildings?
choices: It requires more wires than single-phase systems
It offers constant power delivery and efficiency
It reduces the voltage for all equipment
It eliminates the need for grounding
hints: Three-phase systems deliver power more efficiently and maintain a constant power level, reducing vibrations in motors and increasing performance. This makes them ideal for balanced and stable energy distribution in buildings.
